name: Burooj Education Foundation
briefDescription: Burooj is an not for profit Education and Research organisation working for the advancement of education. It conducts various programmes like teachers training and also runs schools under the self operated and franchaisee models currently Burooj operates around 5 schools with a student population of around 1000 students and also conducts weekend leadership programmes at around 100 centres around the world. Burooj has also conducted teachers training programes which has benefitted more than 5000 teachers.
